purpose: Find the minimum value in a set of numbers
titleCardParagraphs: Excel's MIN function returns the smallest value from the numbers provided. This page shows how to implement Excel's MIN function in Python using pandas.

paragraphs: The MIN function in Excel takes one or more arguments (ranges of numbers or individual numbers) and returns the smallest value among them.

examplesTable.description: Find the smallest value among 1, 5, and 7.
Find the minimum value in the range A1 to A10.

introParagraphs: There are a few common ways to use the MIN function. Below are copy-ready Python implementations for some of the most common use cases.

codeSections.title: Ignoring NaN Values
paragraphs: Just like Excel, by default, pandas excludes NaN values (aka missing values) when calculating the minimum. However, if the entire column or row contains only NaNs, the result will be NaN.
